title: Another fat Bodoni
content:
Hi,

I’m looking for the name of the fat Bodoni used for the text “SPRING, SUMMER &.-10. AUGUST...”

It’s not Carter’s Elephant/Big Figgins or Sahara Bodoni but it’s something along that line. Any ideas?

(The “COPENHAGEN FASHION WEEK” looks like Didot)

Peter

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ss09.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122054950/http:/typophile.com/files/ss09.jpg) | 156.74 KB |

 [‹ Malba Museum Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122054950/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48158 "Go to previous forum topic") [anyone know this font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122054950/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48154 "Go to next forum topic")
author: peter_monrad
